<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ten Lives](/Feats.aspx?ID=5567) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 11 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Evade Doom](/Feats.aspx?ID=5558)

</column>

---

When your character would die, you can attempt a DC 17 flat check. On a success, you're instead reduced to 0 HP and a [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=69) value 1 less than what would normally kill you (typically dying 3). This doesn't change the result for any other creature affected.
name: Ten Lives
